title: Student-Led Personal Learning Environment Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific literacy and fundamental smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: A project-based course where learners select science phenomena encountered in daily life as inquiry topics, construct personal learning environments, and autonomously plan and execute learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can design a Personal Learning Environment (PLE) aligned with their learning styles and goals
Learners can proactively conduct scientific inquiry projects using smartphone-based tools
Learners can evaluate their learning processes and derive improvement strategies through self-reflection

resources: Smartphone-Based Educational App (Lightweight Tools: Google Drive, Notion, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
